title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
After the Warriors impressive win over the Nets, Colin looks at the most successful organizations in sports compared to some of the worst. He discusses the Rams embarrassing defeat to the 49ers after acquiring Odell Beckham Jr. and why it has nothing to do with adding the super star wide receiver. He goes all in on the Dallas Cowboys as they prepare to take on Patrick Mahomes and the Chiefs. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show to defend the Chiefs as one of the elite teams in the NFL right now. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
